msg: In reply to your request, the website was fine, i managed to find the person i want to design the dorma for me
name: Ahmed gomaa

msg: Hi, I am happy to reply to your survey. Yes, the website operated satisfactorily. Yes, I did place an order with Ian Stanley of X Space. I have been very happy with the work he has done for me.
name: ibrahim adel

msg: WOULD RECCOMEND TO ANYONE. Good website. Chose belmont designs for my planning and designs.
name: mostafa ali

msg: We were very happy with the service we received. The website performed well, providing a good selection of options for us to choose from..
name: nada khaled
